info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN STOKES...ROCKINGHAM...HENRY AND SOUTHEASTERN PATRICK COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF MARTINSVILLE THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Figsboro to 6 miles south of Bethany. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph. Very heavy rainfall. Occasional cloud- to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Wind gusts may blow down a few trees and power lines. Very heavy rainfall could result in minor flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eden... Reidsville... Martinsville... Wentworth... Mayodan... Madison... and Walnut Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
